gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਅਹਿਨਿਸਿ ਮਦਿ ਰਹਤ ਭਾਂਜਨ ਬਿਖੈ ਜਾਨਤ ਨ ਮਰਮੁ ਕਿਧੳੁ ਕਵਨ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਰੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Ahinisi Madi Rahat Bhaanjan Bikhai , Jaanat N Maramu Kidhau Kavan Prakaaree Hai ?
translation: Just as wine remains in a bottle day and night but that bottle/ pot does not know its characteristics.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਬੇਲੀ ਭਰਿ ਭਰਿ ਬਾਂਟਿ ਦੀਜੀਅਤ ਸਭਾ ਪਾਵਤ ਨ ਭੇਦੁ ਕਛੁ ਬਿਧਿ ਨ ਬੀਚਾਰੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Baylee Bhari Bhari Baanti Deejeeat Sabhaa , Paavat N Bhaydu Kachhu Bidhi N Beechaaree Hai ?
translation: Just as in a party, wine is distributed in cups, but that cup does not know its (wine) secret nor thinks about it.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਦਿਨਪ੍ਰਤਿ ਮਦੁ ਬੇਚਤ ਕਲਾਲ ਬੈਠੇ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਨ ਜਾਨੲੀ ਦਰਬ ਹਿਤਕਾਰੀ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Dinaprati Madu Baychat Kalaal Baitthay , Mahimaa N Jaanaee Darab Hitakaaree Hai ?
translation: Just as a wine merchant sells wine all the time during the day but his greed of wealth does not know the significance of its intoxication.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਕੇ ਲਿਖਿ ਪੜਿ ਗਾਵਤ ਹੈ ਬਿਰਲੋ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਰਸੁ ਪਦੁ ਅਧਿਕਾਰੀ ਹੈ ||੫੩੦||
transliteration: Taisay Gur Sabad Kay Likhi Parhi Gaavat Hai , Biralo Anmrit Rasu Padu Adhikaaree Hai ?530?
translation: Similarly many write Gur Shabad and Gurbani, sing and read it but. a rare person among them harbours loving desire of relishing and acquiring the divine elixir from it.  (530)
